code: import React from"react";import'./scrollup.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ScrollUp=()=>{window.addEventListener("scroll",function(){const scrollUp=document.querySelector(".scrollup");if(this.scrollY>=560)scrollUp.classList.add("show__scroll");else scrollUp.classList.remove("show__scroll");});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",className:"scrollup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"uil uil-arrow-up scrollup__icon"})});};export default ScrollUp;
